naslov: Dvojnica u blizini plaže: Lovrečica, 131.00 m2 (prodaja)
opis: Nudimo prekrasnu dvojnu vilu udaljenu 350m od prekrasnih plaža. Nalazi se na mirnom mjestu, okružena prirodom i obiteljskim kućama. Sastoji se od podruma, prizemlja i kata. U prizemlju se nalaze dnevni boravak, zasebna kuhinja s blagovaonom, kupaonica, spremište te dvije terase. Na katu se nalaze tri spavaće sobe i kupaonica. U podrumu je veliko spremište. Na ograđenoj okućnici se nalazi parkirno mjesto za jedno vozilo, iza kuće je bazen sa sunčalištem i natkrivenom terasom. Grijanje i hlađenje je osigurano klima uređajima, a pripremljene su i cijevi za ugradnju centralnog grijanja, kuća ima i dimnjak. Ova kvalitetno građena i trenutno služi za turističko iznajmljivanje, a prodaje se kompletno namještena i opremljena. Prekrasne plaže, vrhunski restorani, kafići, pekare, šetnice, biciklističke staze, dječje igralište i razni drugi sadržaji udaljeni su samo nekoliko koraka. Centar Umaga udaljen je 7 km. Prodaje se kompletno namještena i opremljena. Uz vrhunske materijale, maksimalnu udobnost i fantastičnu lokaciju, ova dvojna vila je izvrsna investicija u vašu budućnost. --- We offer a beautiful semi-detached villa 350m from beautiful beaches. It is located in a quiet location, surrounded by nature and family houses. It consists of a basement, ground floor and first floor. On the ground floor there is a living room, a separate kitchen with a dining area, a bathroom, a storage room and two terraces. On the first floor there are three bedrooms and a bathroom. There is a large storage room in the basement. There is a parking space for one vehicle on the fenced plot, behind the house there is a swimming pool with a sunbathing area and a covered terrace. Heating and cooling are provided by air conditioning, and pipes for the installation of central heating are also prepared, the house also has a chimney. This quality built and currently used for tourist rental, is sold fully furnished and equipped. Beautiful beaches, top restaurants, cafes, bakeries, promenades, bicycle paths, a children's playground and various other facilities are just a few steps away. The center of Umag is 7 km away. It is sold fully furnished and equipped. With top-quality materials, maximum comfort and a fantastic location, this semi-detached villa is an excellent investment in your future.
